children.subject: this site may help you get some examples: "2020 Internship Status - COVID-19"

Can you at least tell us the name of the company you're pursuing your internship with? That way, given Berkeley has such a huge class, you might be able to find others in the same boat and unite for advocacy.

history.content:
While I am very grateful that my internship has not been cancelled due to the corona virus, I am a little concerned with how the work from home situation is being handled. 

My internship has stated that even if SIP (shelter-in-place) gets lifted after the internship starts, we may be required to come into the office with no help with housing. It seems that almost every internship has been confirmed to be remote and with the rare exceptions that don't, they seem to be willing to help their interns find housing.

This uncertainty is extremely burdening given that housing is incredibly expensive and not safe to scout right now to begin with. My hope is that if I can get a list of enough companies that have turned their internship programs into becoming completely remote, I can convince the heads of my company to do the same.

It would really mean a lot if anyone is willing to share the name of the company they are working for and how they are handling work from home over the summer. I have also attached a completely anonymous  google form for those wanting complete anonymity. 

It would really mean a lot to get a tiny bit of help here :)

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1sr2UeyU4dIgX6JkTi1eELK-MT9JRLtYl3TLPeLa_SPE/edit
